english: The earth does not end at the sea. There are many dirts beyond the sea. The dirt of my birth.

dothraki: Haésh rákhi vos yómi vosécchi ashefaés. Jíni nem nésa. (826_4.mp3)
ipa: ha.ˈeʃ ˈra.xi vos ˈjo.mi vo.ˈset.tʃi a.ʃe.fa.ˈes ˈdʒi.ni nem ˈne.sa
gloss: spawn-NOM lamb-GEN NEG cross-3PL.NEG.PRES NEG.EMPH river-ACC this-NOM PASS know-3SG
english: The Lamb Men are never to cross the river. This is known.

dothraki: Haésh rákhi dávrae zafraán. Khal Drógo ádroga móra jim che Meereenaán che Yunkayaán, zhey kháleesi. Me vázhoe móra ázzafrokea, majín ázzafroki vázhi kishaán ma hoshór ma tasókh ma tawakóf.  (826_5.mp3)
ipa: ha.ˈeʃ ˈra.xi ˈda.vɾa.e za.fɾa.ˈan xal ˈdɾo.go ˈa.dɾo.ga ˈmo.ɾa dʒim tʃe me.e.ɾe.e.na.ˈan tʃe juŋ.ka.ja.ˈan ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si me ˈva.ʒo.e ˈmo.ɾa ˈaz.za.fɾo.ke.a ma.ˈdʒin ˈaz.za.fɾo.ki ˈva.ʒi ki.ʃa.ˈan ma ho.ˈʃor ma ta.ˈsox ma ta.wa.ˈkof
gloss: spawn-NOM lamb-GEN be.useful-3SG.PRES slave-ALL khal-NOM Drogo-NOM FUT-drive-3SG 3PL.ACC west or Meereen-ALL or Yunkai-ALL VOC Khaleesi-NOM 3SG.NOM FUT-gift-3SG 3PL.ACC slaver-ALL.PL and slaver-NOM.PL FUT-give-3PL 1PL.ALL and gold-ACC and silk-ACC and steel-ACC
english: Lamb Men make good slaves. Khal Drogo will drive them west to Meereen or Yunkai, khaleesi. He will make a gift of them to the slavers, and the slavers will give us gold and silk and steel.

dothraki: Hash yer átihi ánna, hash ánha addrivák yéra, zhey záfra! (827_5.mp3)
ipa: haʃ jer ˈa.ti.hi ˈan.na haʃ ˈan.ha ad.dɾi.ˈvak ˈje.ɾa ʒej ˈza.fra
gloss: if 2SG.NOM FUT-look.at-2SG 1SG.ACC if 1SG.NOM FUT-kill-1SG 2SG.ACC VOC slave-NOM
english: If you look at me, I'll kill you, slave!

dothraki: Mahrázh ánni addrív máe! Tawakóf máe ánni! (827_8.mp3)
ipa: ma.ˈhɾaʒ ˈan.ni ad.ˈdɾiv ˈmae ta.wa.ˈkof ˈma.e ˈan.ni
english: My man killed him! His steel is mine!

dothraki: Arákh máhrazhi yéri ven ﬂech ven hrélki díwe! (827_9.mp3)
ipa: a.ˈɾax ˈma.hɾa.ʒi ˈje.ɾi ven ﬂetʃ ven ˈhɾel.ki ˈdi.we
gloss: arakh-NOM man-GEN 2SG.GEN as dull-NOM.AGR as mushroom-NOM wet-NOM.AGR
english: Your man's arakh is as dull as a wet mushroom!

dothraki: Me vafík, zhey kháleesi. Dóthraki chómoe máe. Hash athlaqár máe zíreyesee khaleesiés, hash ánha aﬁchák sháfkea lekh moón. (828_2.mp3)
ipa: me va.ˈﬁk ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si ˈdo.θɾa.ki ˈtʃo.mo.e ˈma.e haʃ aθ.la.ˈqar ˈma.e ˈzi.ɾe.je.se.e xa.le.e.si.ˈes haʃ ˈan.ha a.ﬁ.ˈtʃak ˈʃaf.ke.a lex mo.ˈon
gloss: 3SG.NOM lamb.person-NOM VOC khaleesi-NOM rider-NOM.PL do.honor-3SG.PRES 3SG.ACC if wailing-NOM 3SG.GEN offend-3SG.PRES khaleesi-ACC if 1SG.NOM FUT-get-1SG 2SG.FRM.ALL tongue-ACC 3SG.ABL
english: She is a lamb girl, Khaleesi. The riders do her honor. If her wailing offends the khaleesi, I will bring you her tongue.

dothraki: Ti máe k'ási ánni, che Khal Drógo ánesa velzeríkh. (828_3.mp3)
ipa: ti ˈma.e ˈka.si ˈan.ni tʃe xal ˈdɾo.go ˈa.ne.sa vel.ze.ˈɾix
gloss: do-COM.FRM 3SG.ACC by-command-GEN or khal-NOM Drogo-NOM FUT-know-3SG excuse-ACC
english: Do as I say, or Khal Drogo will know the reason why.

dothraki: Ánha qorasók jin groqekés! K'ási fíni hash yer nákhoe ánna?  (828_8.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha qo.ɾa.ˈsok dʒin gɾo.qe.ˈkes ˈka.si ˈﬁ.ni haʃ jer ˈna.xo.e ˈan.na
gloss: 1SG.NOM claim-1SG.PRES this ugly.one-ACC by-word-GEN who-GEN Q 2SG.NOM stop-2SG.PRES 1SG.ACC
english: I claim this ugly wench! By whose authority do you stop me?
By the authority of the Khaleesi.

dothraki: Kháleesi ﬁch gech tórga anhoón! Jin me et kash ánha jos! Ánha híle yash! Ánha vos afachák vosécchi jin tikh! Me fáti! Kháleesi vázha anhaán qorasókh ánni, che ánha aﬁchák máe m'arakhoón ánni! Jíni athvilajerár! (829_1.mp3)
ipa: ˈxa.le.e.si ﬁtʃ getʃ ˈtoɾ.ga an.ho.ˈon dʒin me et kaʃ ˈan.ha dʒos ˈan.ha ˈhi.le jaʃ ˈan.ha vos a.fa.ˈtʃak vo.ˈset.tʃi dʒin tix me ˈfa.ti ˈxa.le.e.si ˈva.ʒa an.ha.ˈan qo.ɾa.ˈsox ˈan.ni tʃe ˈan.ha a.ﬁ.ˈtʃak ˈma.e ma.ɾa.xo.ˈon ˈan.ni ˈdʒi.ni aθ.vi.la.dʒe.ˈɾar
gloss: khaleesi-NOM take-PAST hole-ACC under 1SG.ABL this-ACC 3SG.NOM do-PAST while 1SG.NOM thrust-PAST 1SG.NOM dig-PAST air-ACC 1SG.NOM NEG FUT-nod-1SG NEG.EMPH this act-ACC 3SG.NOM insult-NOM khaleesi-NOM FUT-give-3SG 1SG.ALL prize-ACC 1SG.GEN or 1SG.NOM FUT-take-1SG 3SG.ACC with-arakh-ABL 1SG.GEN this-NOM war-NOM
english: The Khaleesi took my bitch right from under me! She did this mid-thrust! I was fucking the air! I will not stand for this! It's an insult! The Khaleesi will give me my spoils, or I will take them with my arakh! This is war!

dothraki: Probably should've been móra. Now for the scripted dialogue. First is Drogo's ﬁrst line then his continuation. Zhey jalán átthirari ánni, jinák Mágo, fíni dóthrae ma khasoón Kósi Zháqo. (829_2.mp3)
ipa: ʒej dʒa.ˈlan ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ni dʒi.ˈnak ˈma.go ﬁn ˈdo.θɾa.e ma xa.so.ˈon ˈko.si ˈʒa.qo
gloss: VOC moon-NOM life-GEN 1SG.GEN this-NOM Mago-NOM REL.NOM ride-3SG.PRES with khas-ABL ko-GEN Zhaqo-NOM
english: Moon of my life, this is Mago, who rides with the khas of Ko Zhaqo.

dothraki: Me ásta mesháfka ﬁch qorasókh máe: óhara háeshi rákhi ﬁn qóraso me ásaja máe. Ásti anhaán hash jíni jíla. (829_3.mp3)
ipa: ˈdʒi.ni aθ.vi.la.dʒe.ˈɾar dʒin ˈtʃi.o.ɾi.si ˈza.fɾa ad.ˈdʒin ma.ˈdʒin ˈki.ʃa ˈa.ta.ki ˈmo.ɾe.a ven me ˈval.la.ja.fa ˈki.ʃa
gloss: this-NOM war-NOM this woman-NOM.PL slave-NOM now and 1PL.NOM FUT-do-1PL 3PL.ALL as 3SG.NOM FUT-please-3SG 1PL.ACC
english: He says that you took his spoils, a daughter of the Lamb Men who was his to mount. Tell me if this is so.

dothraki: Mágo ásta k'áthjilari, zhey shekh ma shíeraki ánni. Ánha ray qóraso san óhari asshékh, majín móri nem vos ósaji. (829_4.mp3)
ipa: ˈma.go ˈas.ta ˈkaθ.dʒi.la.ɾi ʒej ʃex ma ˈʃi.e.ɾa.ki ˈan.ni ˈan.ha raj ˈqo.ɾa.so san ˈo.ha.ɾi aʃ.ˈʃex ma.ˈdʒin ˈmo.ɾi nem vos ˈo.sa.dʒi
gloss: Mago-NOM say-3SG.PRES by-rightness-GEN VOC sun-NOM ma star-NOM.PL 1SG.GEN 1SG.NOM already claim-PAST many daughter-GEN today-ACC and 3PL.NOM PASS NEG FUT.NEG-mount-3PL
english: Mago speaks truly, my sun and stars. I have claimed many daughters this day, so they might not be mounted.

dothraki: Jíni athvilajerár. Jin chíorisi záfra ajjín, majín kísha átaki mórea ven me vállayafa kísha. (829_5.mp3)
ipa: ˈdʒi.ni aθ.vi.la.dʒe.ˈɾar dʒin ˈtʃi.o.ɾi.si ˈza.fɾa ad.ˈdʒin ma.ˈdʒin ˈki.ʃa ˈa.ta.ki ˈmo.ɾe.a ven me ˈval.la.ja.fa ˈki.ʃa
gloss: this-NOM war-NOM this woman-NOM.PL slave-NOM now and 1PL.NOM FUT-do-1PL 3PL.ALL as 3SG.NOM FUT-please-3SG 1PL.ACC
english: This is war. These women are slaves now, and we will do with them as pleases us.

dothraki: Ánha nem allayafák vassandík móra. Hash dóthraki sháfki'th sáji móra, hash móri jif kémoe ma móroa. Ázhi mórea nevákh she khalasár majín móri váyyoli sháfkea rizhés. (829_6.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha nem al.la.ja.ˈfak vas.san.ˈdik ˈmo.ɾa haʃ ˈdo.θɾa.ki ˈʃaf.kiθ ˈsa.dʒi ˈmo.ɾa haʃ ˈmo.ɾa dʒif ˈke.mo.e ma ˈmo.ɾo.a ˈa.ʒi ˈmo.ɾe.a ne.ˈvax ʃe xa.la.ˈsar ma.ˈdʒin ˈmo.ɾi ˈvaj.jo.li ˈʃaf.ke.a ri.ˈʒes
gloss: 1SG.NOM PASS please-1SG.PRES FUT-secure-1SG 3PL.ACC of rider-NOM.PL 2SG.FRM.GEN must mount-3PL.PRES 3PL.ACC if 3PL.NOM should marry-3PL.PRES with 3PL.ABL give-COM.FRM 3PL.ALL place- ACC in khalasar-NOM and FUT-bear-3PL 2PL.FRM.ALL son-ACC.PL
english: It pleases me to ensure their safety. If your riders wish to mount them, let them take them as wives. Give them a place in the khalasar and let them bear you sons.
Does the horse mate with the lamb?!

dothraki: Zhavvórsa vádakhera ma hrazéf ma vaf ákkate. (829_8.mp3)
ipa: ʒav.ˈvoɾ.sa ˈva.da.xe.ɾa ma hɾa.ˈzef ma vaf ˈak.ka.te
gloss: dragon-NOM feed-3SG.PRES and horse-ACC and lamb-ACC both
english: The dragon feeds on horse and lamb alike.

dothraki: Tíhi kíﬁnosi me ívezhofoe! Hazák rizh ánni mra me: Vezh fíni Ásaja Rhaesheserés, fíni nírra máe vorsasoón máe. Zhey Mágo, ánha acharák vos ále. Ezás éshna gech áhilee. (829_9.mp3)
ipa: ˈti.hi ˈki.ﬁ.no.si me ˈi.ve.ʒo.fo.e ha.ˈzak riʒ ˈan.ni mɾa me veʒ ˈﬁ.ni ˈa.sa.dʒa ɾha.e.ʃe.se. ˈɾes ˈﬁ.ni ˈni.ra ˈma.e voɾ.sa.so.ˈon ˈma.e ʒej ma.go ˈan.ha a.tʃa.ˈɾak vos ˈa.le e.ˈzas ˈeʃ.na getʃ ˈa.hi.le.e
gloss: see-COM.FRM how 3SG.NOM grow.ﬁerce-3SG.PRES that-NOM son-NOM 1SG.GEN in 3SG.NOM stallion- NOM REL.NOM FUT-mount-3SG world-ACC REL.NOM ﬁll-3SG.PRES 3SG.ACC ﬁre-ABL 3SG.GEN VOC Mago- NOM 1SG.NOM FUT-hear-1SG NEG more ﬁnd-COM.INFR another hole-ACC FUT-dig-2SG
english: See how ﬁerce she grows? That is my son inside her, the Stallion who will Mount the World, ﬁlling her with his ﬁre. Mago, I will hear no more. Find somewhere else to stick your cock.
My son and stars is hurt…

dothraki: Me zisósh, zhey jalán átthirari. Ánha addrív mahrazhés fíni rísse anhoón. (829_11.mp3)
ipa: me zi.ˈsoʃ ʒej dʒa.ˈlan ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ha ad.ˈdɾiv ma.hra.ˈʒes ˈﬁ.ni ˈris.se an.ho.ˈon
gloss: 3SG.NOM scratch-NOM VOC moon-NOM life-GEN 1SG.NOM kill-PAST man-ACC REL.NOM cut-PAST 1SG.ABL
english: It's a scratch, Moon of My Life. I killed the man who cut me.

dothraki: Vo mahrázh laz kóvara hatíf shékhi átthirari ánni… (829_12.mp3)
ipa: vo ma.ˈhɾaʒ laz ˈko.va.ɾa ha.ˈtif ʃex ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ni
gloss: NEG man-NOM can stand-3SG.PRES before sun-GEN life-GEN 1SG.GEN
english: No man can stand before the sun of my life…

dothraki: Fínne kóalaki? Kíﬁndirgi móri vos sílio khalés? (829_13.mp3)
ipa: ˈﬁn.ne ˈko.a.la.ki ˈki.ﬁn.diɾ.gi ˈmo.ɾi vos ˈsi.li.o xa.ˈles
gloss: where-ACC healer-NOM.PL why 3PL.NOM NEG attend-3SG.NEG.PRES khal-ACC
english: Where are the healers? Why do they not attend the khal?

dothraki: San dóthraki zísi. Móri jífo kóali átte. Jíni ósto áﬁsi. Rhogór vezhvén ásila ma ánha vattihák moón rizhés ánni. (829_14.mp3)
ipa: san ˈdo.θɾa.ki ˈzi.si ˈmo.ɾi ˈdʒi.fo ˈko.a.li ˈat.te ˈdʒi.ni ˈos.to ˈa.ﬁ.si ɾho.ˈgor veʒ.ˈven ˈa.si.la ma ˈan.ha at.ti.ˈhak mo.ˈon riʒ ˈan.ni
gloss: many rider-NOM.PL hurt-3PL.PRES 3PL.NOM should-PASS heal-3PL.PRES ﬁrst this-NOM bite-NOM ﬂy-GEN scar-NOM great-NOM.AGR FUT-follow-3SG and 1SG.NOM FUT-show-1SG 3SG.ABL son-ACC 1SG.GEN
english: Many riders are hurt. They should be healed ﬁrst. This is the bite of a ﬂy. It will leave a ﬁne scar to show my son.

dothraki: Khal zígeree vo rhéllay ha zafroón fíni góvi oqét. (829_15.mp3)
ipa: xal ˈzi.ge.ɾe.e vo ˈɾhel.laj ha za.fɾo.ˈon ˈﬁ.ni ˈgo.vi o.ˈqet
gloss: khal-NOM need-3SG.PRES NEG help-ACC from slave-ABL REL.NOM mate-3PL.PRES sheep-ACC
english: The Khal needs no help from slaves who lie with sheep.
She is mine. She will speak.

dothraki: Áse sékke. Áse máegi ízzi char. (829_18.mp3)
ipa: ˈa.se ˈsek.ke ˈa.se ˈma.e.gi ˈiz.zi tʃar
gloss: word-NOM too.much word-NOM witch-GEN poison-3SG.PRES ear-ACC
english: Too many words. A witch's words poison the ears.

dothraki: Kháleesi zála memé ádakha esinákh ajjalán. Hash yer laz ógi loy mawízzi? (more8_2.mp3)
ipa: ˈxa.le.e.si ˈza.la me.ˈme ˈa.da.xa e.si.ˈnax ad.dʒa.ˈlan haʃ jer laz ˈo.gi loj ma.ˈwiz.zi
gloss: khaleesi-NOM want-3SG.PRES COMP-3SG.NOM eat-3SG.PRES different.thing-ACC tonight-ACC Q 2SG.INFR.NOM can slaughter-2SG.PRES few-ACC rabbit-GEN
english: The khaleesi wants to eat something different tonight. Can you kill some rabbits?

dothraki: Ezás loy álegri h'anhaán. Móri állayaﬁ máe, jin álegra. (more8_4.mp3)
ipa: e.ˈzas loj ˈa.le.gɾi han.ha.ˈan ˈmo.ɾi ˈal.la.ja.ﬁ ˈma.e dʒin ˈa.le.gɾa
gloss: ﬁnd-CMD.INFR some-ACC duck-GEN for-1SG.ALL 3PL.NOM please-3PL.PRES 3SG.ACC this duck-NOM
english: Find some ducks for me. She likes ducks.

dothraki: Hash yer ray tih loy álegri, zhey víkeesi? Vos mawízzi; vos álegra. Hash tíhi vékhi she nháre yeroón? (more8_5.mp3)
ipa: haʃ jer ray tih loy ˈa.le.gɾi ʒej ˈvi.ke.e.si vos ma.ˈwiz.zi vos ˈa.le.gɾa haʃ ˈti.hi ˈve.xi ʃe ˈnha.ɾe je.ɾo.ˈon
gloss: Q 2SG.INFR.NOM already see-PAST some-ACC duck-GEN VOC nag-NOM NEG rabbit-NOM NEG duck-NOM Q eye-GEN.PL exist-3PL.PRES on head-NOM 2SG.INFR.ABL
english: Have you seen any ducks, woman? No rabbits, no ducks. Do you have eyes in your head?

dothraki: can be substituted directly). The same goes for the word óggo. This is the word for an animal's head. If Rakharo wants to be really insulting, he can use the word óggo in place of nháre (again, the word can be substituted straight in). It would be quite an insult, though (certainly over the top). Majín jáno! Ánha ray tih san jáni! (more8_6.mp3)
ipa: ma.ˈdʒin ˈdʒa.no ˈan.ha ray tih san ˈdʒa.ni
gloss: therefore dog-NOM 1SG.NOM already see-PAST many-ACC dog-GEN
english: Dog, then. I have seen many dogs!

dothraki: Me ast, "Esinákh hrazefoón". Énta mra me fáka arrék me ádakha hrazéf. (more8_8.mp3)
ipa: me ast e.si.ˈnax hɾa.ze.fo.ˈon ˈen.ta mɾa me ˈfa.ka a.ˈrek me ˈa.da.xa hɾa.ˈzef
gloss: 3SG.NOM say-PAST different.thing-NOM horse-ABL baby-NOM in 3SG.NOM kick-3SG.PRES when 3SG.NOM eat-3SG.PRES horse-ACC
english: She said, 'Anything but horse.' The baby inside her kicks when she eats horse.
It's good for the baby to kick.

dothraki: Hash yer nési qísi énta ajjín? Hash yer víllo vezhvén ﬁn nésa qísi énta? (more8_10.mp3)
ipa: haʃ jer ˈne.si ˈqi.si ˈen.ta ad.ˈdʒin haʃ jer ˈvil.lo veʒ.ˈven ﬁn ˈne.sa ˈqi.si ˈen.ta
gloss: Q 2SG.INFR.NOM know-2SG.PRES about baby-NOM now-ACC Q 2SG.INFR.NOM wise.one-NOM great- NOM.AGR COMP know-2SG.PRES about baby-NOM now-ACC
english: Now you know babies? You're a great wise man who knows about babies?

dothraki: Zhey jalán átthirari ánni, Mágo ásta mesháfka ﬁch qorasókh máe: óhara háeshi rákhi ﬁn qóraso me ásaja máe. Ásti anhaán hash jíni jíla. (n829_1.mp3)
ipa: ʒej dʒa.ˈlan ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ni dʒi.ˈnak ˈma.go ˈas.ta me.ˈʃaf.ka ﬁtʃ qo.ɾa.ˈsox ˈma.e ˈo.ha.ɾa ˈha.e.ʃi ˈra.xi ﬁn ˈqo.ɾa.so me ˈa.sa.dʒa ˈma.e ˈas.ti an.ha.ˈan haʃ ˈdʒi.ni ˈdʒi.la
gloss: VOC moon-NOM life-GEN 1SG.GEN Mago-NOM say-3SG.PRES COMP-2SG.FRM.NOM take-PAST spoil-ACC 3SG.GEN daughter-NOM spawn-GEN lamb-GEN REL.ACC take-PAST 3SG.NOM FUT-mount-3SG 3SG.ACC say-COM.FRM 1SG.ALL if this-NOM be.true-3SG.PRES
english: Moon of my life, Mago says that you took his spoils, a daughter of the Lamb Men who was his to mount. Tell me if this is so.

dothraki: Yer ifák. Yer ássoo ánna voséchhi! (n829_2.mp3)
ipa: jer i.ˈfak jer ˈas.so.o ˈan.na vo.ˈset.tʃi
english: You are a foreigner. You do not command me.

dothraki: Ánha kháleesi. Ánha assók yéra sekósshi. (n829_3.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha ˈxa.le.e.si ˈan.ha as.ˈsok ˈje.ɾa se.ˈkoʃ.ʃi
english: I am khaleesi. I do command you.

dothraki: Khal ﬁn ássoe mezháh jáhakmeni vos khal. (n829_4.mp3)
ipa: xal ﬁn ˈas.soe me.ˈʒah dʒa.hak.ˈmen vos xal
gloss: khal-NOM REL.ACC order-3SG.PRES whore-NOM.PL foreign-NOM.PL.AGR NEG khal-NOM
english: A Khal who takes orders from foreign whores is no Khal.

dothraki: Ánha vazhók khadoés yeroón virsalát. Ánha ochomók yeraán kíjinosi. (n829_5.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha va.ˈʒok xa.do.ˈes je.ɾo.ˈon viɾ.sa.ˈlat ˈan.ha o.tʃo.ˈmok je.ɾa.ˈan ˈki.dʒi.no.si
english: I will not have your body burned. I will not give you that honor.

dothraki: Khádo yeroón nem vos vávvirsao. Yer nem óchomoo kíjinosi. (n829_6.mp3)
ipa: xa.do je.ɾo.ˈon nem vos ˈvav.viɾ.sa.o jer nem ˈo.tʃo.mo.o ˈki.dʒi.no.si
gloss: body-NOM 2SG.INFR.ABL PASS NEG FUT-burn-3SG.NEG 2SG.NOM PASS NEG.FUT-do.honor-3SG in.this.way
english: Your body will not be burned. You shall not have that honor.

dothraki: Ínte vádakhie tíhoa ma khéwo áﬁlki vi gadimaán. (n829_7.mp3)
ipa: ˈin.te ˈva.da.xi.e ˈti.ho.a ma ˈxe.wo ˈa.ﬁl.ki vi ga.di.ma.ˈan
gloss: beetle-NOM.PL FUT-sup.on-3PL eye-ABL.PL and worm-NOM.PL FUT-worm-3PL among lung-ALL.PL
english: The beetles will feed on your eyes and the worms will crawl through your lungs.

dothraki: Eyél várthasoe she ilekaán ríkhoya arrekaán vékha vósi yeroón vósma tolórro. (n829_8.mp3)
ipa: e.ˈjel ˈvaɾ.θa.so.e ʃe i.le.ka.ˈan ˈri.xo.ja a.re.ka.ˈan ˈve.xa ˈvo.si je.ɾo.ˈon ˈvos.ma to.ˈlo.ro
gloss: rain-NOM FUT-fall-3SG on ﬂesh-ALL rot-PRES.PART.NNM.AGR when-ALL exist-3SG.PRES nothing-GEN 2SG.INFR.ABL but bone-NOM.PL
english: The rain will fall on your rotting skin until nothing is left of you but bones.

dothraki: Majín hash yer ájadoe emrakhaán Rháeshi Ájjalani áviqaferi athmithrár nákhomena, hash móri ájasi yéra zohaán, ma ásikhtee yéra, ma áfati hrazéf yéri. (n829_9.mp3)
ipa: ma.ˈdʒin haʃ jer ˈa.dʒa.do.e em.ɾa.xa.ˈan ˈɾha.e.ʃi ˈad.dʒa.la.ni ˈa.vi.qa.fe.ɾi aθ.miθ.ˈɾar ˈna.xo.me.na haʃ ˈmo.ɾi ˈa.dʒa.si ˈje.ɾa zo.ha.ˈan ma ˈa.six.te.e ˈje.ɾa ma ˈa.fa.ti hɾa.ˈzef ˈje.ɾi
gloss: and.so if 2SG.NOM FUT-arrive-2SG gate-ALL land-GEN.PL night-PL.AGR FUT-beg-2SG rest-ACC endless- NNM.AGR if 3PL.NOM FUT-laugh-3PL 2SG.ACC nadir-ALL and FUT-spit-3PL 2SG.ACC and FUT-slap-3PL horse-ACC 2SG.GEN
english: And when you arrive at the gates of the Night Lands to beg for eternal rest, they will laugh at you, and spit upon you, and turn you away.
First you have to kill me.

dothraki: Ánha laz rhelák dothrakés vézhvena ha zisoshaán máe. (n829_12.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha laz ɾhe.ˈlak do.θɾa.ˈkes ˈveʒ.ve.na ha zi.so.ʃa.ˈan ˈma.e
gloss: 1SG.NOM can help-1SG.PRES rider-ACC great-NNM.AGR for cut-ALL 3SG.GEN
english: I can help the great rider with his cut.

dothraki: Azhás maán afﬁsát zis yéri, shekh ma shíeraki ánni. Me ázzisa ánna jin tihát meyér qíyae. (n829_13.mp3)
ipa: a.ˈʒas ma.ˈan af.ﬁ.ˈsat zis ˈje.ɾi ʃex ma ˈʃi.e.ɾa.ki ˈan.ni me ˈaz.zi.sa ˈan.na dʒin ti.ˈhat me.ˈjer ˈqi.ja.e
gloss: give-COM.INFR 3SG.ALL clean-INF wound-ACC 2SG.GEN sun-NOM and star-NOM.PL 1SG.GEN 3SG.NOM hurt-3SG.PRES 1SG.ACC see-INF COMP-2SG.NOM bleed-2SG.PRES
english: Let her clean your wound, my sun and stars. It makes me hurt to see you bleed.
My lord? My sun and stars?

dothraki: Me arthás hrazefoón máe. Khal fíni laz vos dóthrao vos khal. (910A_6.mp3)
ipa: me aɾ.ˈθas hɾa.ze.fo.ˈon ˈma.e xal ˈﬁ.ni laz vos ˈdo.θɾa.o vos xal
gloss: 3SG.NOM fall-PAST horse-ABL 3SG.GEN khal-NOM REL.NOM can NEG ride-3SG.PRES.NEG NEG khal-NOM
english: He fell from his horse. A khal who cannot ride is no khal.

dothraki: Me háqa, vos ále. Me zígeree mithrát. (910A_7.mp3)
ipa: me ˈha.qa vos ˈale me ˈzi.ge.ɾe.e mi.ˈθɾat
english: He's tired, that's all. He needs to rest.

dothraki: Kísha ray hezháh chek asshékh. Kísha ávimithreraki jínne. (910A_8.mp3)
ipa: ˈki.ʃa raj he.ˈʒah tʃek aʃ.ˈʃex ˈki.ʃa ˈa.vi.mi.θɾe.ɾa.ki ˈdʒin.ne
gloss: 1PL.NOM already travel.far-PAST well today-ACC 1PL.NOM FUT-camp-1PL here-ACC
english: We've ridden far enough today. We will camp here.

dothraki: Jínne vos gáche vimithrerát. Chíori vos ássoe kísha. Vos kháleesi ákka. (910A_9.mp3)
ipa: ˈdʒin.ne vos ˈga.tʃe vi.mi.θɾe.ˈɾat ˈtʃi.o.ɾi vos ˈas.so.e ˈki.ʃa vos ˈxa.le.e.si ˈak.ka
gloss: here-ACC NEG place-NOM camp-INF woman-NOM NEG order-3SG.PRES 1PL.ACC NEG khaleesi-NOM also
english: This is no place to camp. A woman does not give us orders. Not even a khaleesi.

dothraki: Kísha ávimithreraki jínne. Ásti moraán me Khal Drógo ásso moón. Zhey Qótho— (910A_10.mp3)
ipa: ˈki.ʃa ˈa.vi.mi.θɾe.ɾa.ki ˈdʒin.ne ˈas.ti mo.ɾa.ˈan me xal ˈdɾo.go ˈas.so mo.ˈon ʒej ˈqo.θo
gloss: 1PL.NOM FUT-camp-1PL here-ACC tell-COM.FRM 3PL.ALL COMP khal-NOM Drogo-NOM order-PAST 3SG.ABL VOC Qotho-NOM
english: We will camp here. Tell them Khal Drogo commanded it. Qotho—

dothraki: Sháfka vos ássoe ánna, zhey Kháleesi. (910A_11.mp3)
ipa: ˈʃaf.ka vos ˈas.so.e ˈan.na ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si
english: You do not command me, Khaleesi.

dothraki: Should have been ássoo since it was negative. This was likely the line that Dar Salima pronounced perfectly, as luck would have it. Dany persists too. Ézi Mírri Maz Duur. Fíchi máe anhaán. (910A_12.mp3)
ipa: ˈe.zi ˈmi.ri maz dur ˈﬁ.tʃi ˈma.e an.ha.ˈan
english: Find Mirri Maz Duur. Bring her to me.
The witch? I'll bring you her head.

dothraki: Fíchi máe anhaán—ózisa—che Khal Drógo áchara kíﬁndirgi yer zíganeso anhaán. (910A_14.mp3)
ipa: ˈﬁ.tʃi ˈma.e an.ha.ˈan ˈo.zi.sa tʃe xal ˈdɾo.go ˈa.tʃa.ɾa ˈki.ﬁn.diɾ.gi jer ˈzi.ga.ne.so an.ha.ˈan
gloss: bring-COM.FRM 3SG.ACC 1SG.ALL unharmed-NNM.AGR or khal-NOM Drogo-NOM FUT-hear-3SG why 2SG.INFR.NOM defy-PAST 1SG.ALL
english: Bring her to me, unharmed, or Khal Drogo will hear why you deﬁed me.

dothraki: Dóthrae… Lána… Tiv… Simón ánni… Me ázha… Vos…laz lorrák… Loqám… Ánha…tihák loqám… Vórsa… Me vórsa… Me vírzetha… Asávva… Vezh… (914_1.mp3)
ipa: ˈdo.θɾa.e ˈla.na tiv si.ˈmon ˈan.ni me ˈa.ʒa vos laz lo.ˈrak lo.ˈqam ˈan.ha ti.ˈhak lo.ˈqam ˈvoɾ.sa me ˈvoɾ.sa me ˈviɾ.ze.θa a.ˈsav.va veʒ
gloss: ride-3SG.PRES run-3SG.PRES wax-NOM uncle-NOM 1SG.GEN 3SG.NOM give-3SG.PRES NEG can blink-1SG.PRES arrow-NOM 1SG.NOM see-1SG.PRES arrow-ACC ﬁre-NOM 3SG.NOM ﬁre-NOM 3SG.NOM be.red-3SG.PRES sky-NOM stallion-NOM
english: Rides… Runs… Wax… My uncle… He gives… No…can blink… Arrows… I…see arrows… Fire… It's a ﬁre… It's red… The sky… The stallion…
Khaleesi… He fell from his horse.

dothraki: Me áfazha sékke. Rhéla ánna azzohát máe mra lommayaán. (914_5.mp3)

ipa: vos haʃ ˈʃaf.ka vos ˈza.li me.ˈme nem ˈaz.zi.sa za.ˈlas me.ˈki.ʃa vos ˈaz.zi.sa.ki ˈʃaf.ka ˈak.ka ˈʃaf.ka aʒ ma.e.ga.ˈan fɾa.ˈxat xa.ˈles ˈki.ʃi
gloss: NEG Q 2SG.FRM.NOM NEG want-3PL.PRES COMP-3SG.NOM PASS hurt-3SG.PRES want-COM.FRM COMP-1PL.NOM NEG hurt-1PL.PRES 2SG.FRM.ACC also 2SG.FRM.NOM give-PAST this witch-ALL touch-INF khal-ACC 1PL.GEN
english: No? You don't want her hurt? Pray that we don't hurt you, too. You let this witch lay hands on our khal.

english: Khaleesi… Don't do this thing. Let me kill this witch.

ipa: haʃ jer ˈad.dɾi.vi ˈma.e haʃ jer ˈad.dɾi.vi xa.ˈles ˈje.ɾi

The Horse God has been angered!

gloss: see-INF.ACC 1PL.NOM this stallion-ACC REL.NOM FUT-mount-3SG world-ACC

dothraki: short one. Vos ále means "no more of" (referring to something like a substance), whereas vos álle is an adverb. The l should be lingered over for emphasis. From episode 10. Ánha ray ast asqóy sháfkea, zhey kháleesi. Ánha qoy sháfkoa ájjin. (rew2.mp3)

gloss: give-COM.FRM 1SG.ABL present-INF visitor-ACC.PL respectful-PL.AGR 1SG.GEN Viserys-NOM tent- COL.ABL Targaryen-GEN third-NOM that name-ABL king-NOM rightful-NOM.AGR Andal-GEN.PL and man-GEN.PL ﬁrst-GEN.PL and sister-NOM 3SG.GEN Daenerys-NOM tent-COL.ABL Targaryen-GEN

ipa: ʒej dʒa.ˈlan ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ni haʃ jer ˈzi.si

gloss: choose-CMD.FRM any horse-ACC COMP-NOM please-3SG.PRES 2SG.FRM.ACC herd-ABL 1SG.GEN 3SG.NOM 2SG.FRM.GEN 1SG.NOM present-1SG.PRES this gift-ACC 2SG.FRM.ALL

english: You will be my khalasar. I see the faces of slaves. I free you. Take off your collars. Go if you wish, no one will stop you. If you stay, it will be as brothers and sisters, husbands and wives.

dothraki: Ánha Dáeneris Vazyól, okreseroón Tárgaryeni, qoyoón Váliri érshe. Ánha óhara zhavvórsi, ma ánha asták asqóy yérea memóri fíni ázisi yéri ádrivoe m'awazoón. (1030_2.mp3)

english: I am Daenerys Stormborn, of House Targaryen, of the blood of old Valyria. I am the dragon's daughter, and I swear to you that those who would harm you will die screaming.

english: He shouts like a man, but he pisses like a little boy!
You're right, he's like a goat!

ipa: haʃ me ˈa.dʒa.da jin.na.ˈan haʃ ˈan.ha a.fa.ˈtak ˈma.e ha.ti.fa.ˈan

dothraki: Azhás anhaán attihát yéra ezhiroón ésina. (drd003_2.mp3)
ipa: a.ˈʒas an.ha.ˈan at.ti.ˈhat ˈje.ɾa e.ʒi.ɾo.ˈon ˈe.si.na
english: Let me show you a different kind of dance.

dothraki: Lekh yeroón ádikana rháesoa, zhey Vasterák! (drd003_3.mp3)
ipa: lex je.ɾo.ˈon ˈa.di.ka.na ˈɾha.e.so.a ʒej vas.te.ˈɾak
english: Your tongue is faster than your feet, talkative one!
Give it to me, my little light.

ipa: ˈdʒi.ni aθ.ɾha.ˈnar fɾa.ˈxos ˈos.te ˈaθ.ɾha.na.ɾi ˈan.ni

ipa: sek me ˈal.la.ja.fa ˈan.na rek ˈva.es me ˈve.e an.ho.ˈon av.ˈvos

dothraki: Óven Yógo. Jahák máe'sh ée moón! (rs_4.mp3)
ipa: ˈo.ven ˈjo.go dʒa.ˈhak ˈma.eʃ ˈe.e mo.ˈon
english: Not like Yogo. He'd forget his braid!
I took this horse from a Qartheen.
Yes. We are the true race.

ipa: san ˈhɾa.ze.ﬁ ˈveʒ.ve.ni vex ma.ve.so.ˈon ˈan.ni
english: My father had many excellent horses.

english: Ha! I love my horse too.
This is a good place to camp.
The camp from last night wasn't any good.
The ground was all mud and the air was cold.

dothraki: Fíni ánnitha rek chioriés? Me zhíkhvena k'áthtihari. (gow_6.mp3)
ipa: ˈﬁ.ni ˈan.ni.θa rek tʃi.o.ɾi.ˈes me ˈʒix.ve.na ˈkaθ.ti.ha.ɾi

She's not used to being Dothraki.

dothraki: Ahéshke vo dávrao. Vorsáska állayafa ánna. (gow_12.mp3)

The sun's been obscured by clouds.
She will give birth to a child.
The khaleesi will be got with child tonight.
This is good for the khalasar.
I don't think this is good.

ipa: me nem ˈke.ma ma tʃi.o.ɾi.ˈes ˈdo.θɾa.ki

ipa: ma.ˈdʒin ˈki.ﬁn.diɾ.gi jer ˈsi.li ˈan.na aj.ˈjej

ipa: ˈki.ʃa dʒif ˈqa.fa.ki ˈʃi.e.ɾa.ko.a go.ˈɾat ha ma.ˈan
english: We should ask the stars to charge for him.
Maybe the new leader will come.
He will ride to the Night Lands.
We're going to see guts on the ground tonight!

ipa: ak.ko.va.ˈɾas jer tʃe mah.ˈɾaʒ tʃe rax

A great man! A great man!
We've arrived, by the great horse god.
Vaes Dothrak: The City of Warriors.

dothraki: Ánha ray vo tího emrákh avvós. (athg_3.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha raj vo ˈti.ho em.ˈɾax av.ˈvos
english: I have never seen the gateway.
It's a symbol of our greatness.
We must set up camp before sunset.
The Khal will want a feast tonight.

dothraki: Fínsanneya kárlini álle? Hrazéf kíshi háqoe. (adr_1.mp3)
ipa: ˈﬁn.san.ne.ja ˈkaɾ.li.ni ˈal.le hɾa.ˈzef ˈki.ʃi ˈha.qo.e
english: How many miles further? Our horses tire.

dothraki: Finés móri vílojeri? Fin me ray et? (adr_4.mp3)
ipa: ﬁ.ˈnes ˈmo.ɾi ˈvi.lo.dʒe.ɾi ﬁn me raj et
english: Who are they beating? What has he done?

dothraki: Ánha vos nesók. Móri févee qoyoón ma athvervenaroón, k'áthtihari. (adr_5.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha vos ne.ˈsok ˈmo.ɾi ˈfe.ve.e qo.jo.ˈon ma aθ.veɾ.ve.na.ɾo.ˈon ˈkaθ.ti.ha.ɾi
english: I don't know. It seems they thirst for blood and violence.
Pull the tongue from his head!
Carve his heart out of his chest!
The Stallion who Mounts the World!

dothraki: Me chíori ánni, rekák rékke. Ánha aqorasók máe ajjalán! (624_3.mp3)
ipa: me ˈtʃi.o.ɾi ˈan.ni re.ˈkak ˈrek.ke ˈan.ha a.qo.ɾa.ˈsok ˈma.e ad.dʒa.ˈlan
english: She's my woman, that one there. I will have her tonight!
To the Stallion who Mounts the World!

dothraki: Ma hash ánha anajahák, hash yer eth áhilee rek jerakés gróqe—me ﬁn jéra kimíkh ma zhorróf she Jeresér Jim! (624_9.mp3)
ipa: ma haʃ ˈan.ha a.na.dʒa.ˈhak haʃ jer eθ ˈa.hi.le.e rek dʒe.ɾa.ˈkes ˈgro.qe me ﬁn ˈdʒe.ɾa ki.ˈmix ma ʒo.ˈrof ʃe dʒe.ɾe.ˈser dʒim
english: And if I win, then you have to bed that ugly trader—the one that was selling dates and ﬁgs at the Western Market!

dothraki: Ha fansaán ánni h'ochaán yéri. Hash yer ásti, aá? (624_10.mp3)
ipa: ha fan.sa.ˈan ˈan.ni ho.tʃa.ˈan ˈje.ɾi haʃ jer ˈas.ti a.ˈa
english: My dapple for your dun. What do you say?
I certainly was in the right.
The khal should take his hand…
You will give it to me.

ipa: vos a vos a vos a.ˈʒas an.ha.ˈan ti.ˈhat ˈma.e
english: No, no, no! Let me see it.

dothraki: Kimíkh! Kimíkh ma zhorróf! Chof k'áthjilari! (77_1.mp3)
ipa: ki.ˈmix ki.ˈmix ma ʒo.ˈrof tʃof ˈkaθ.ji.la.ɾi
english: Dates! Dates and ﬁgs! Very fresh!

dothraki: Sérja! Sash ma laín! Sérja! Yer zígeree serj sásha ma láina! (77_2.mp3)
ipa: ˈseɾ.dʒa saʃ ma la.ˈin ˈseɾ.dʒa jer ˈzi.ge.ɾe.e seɾdʒ ˈsa.ʃa ma ˈla.i.na
english: Vests! New and stylish! Vests! You need a new and stylish vest!

dothraki: Fichós íme sásha! Me véssa atthirár yéri! (77_3.mp3)
ipa: ﬁ.ˈtʃos ˈi.me ˈsa.ʃa me ˈves.sa aθ.θi.ˈɾar ˈje.ɾi
english: Buy a new belt! It will change your life!

dothraki: Fichós ﬁríkh sásha che ánha némo addrivák! (77_4.mp3)
ipa: ﬁ.ˈtʃos ﬁ.ˈɾix ˈsa.ʃa tʃe ˈan.ha ˈne.mo ad.dɾi.ˈvak
english: Buy a new ring or I'll kill myself!

dothraki: Éshina! Éshina chof! Éshina havazhoón! Éshina áshefasi! Jóma m'ággi! (77_5.mp3)
ipa: ˈe.ʃi.na ˈe.ʃi.na tʃof ˈe.ʃi.na ha.va.ʒo.ˈon ˈe.ʃi.na ˈa.ʃe.fa.si ˈdʒo.ma ˈmag.gi
english: Fish! Fresh ﬁsh! Ocean ﬁsh! River ﬁsh! Salmon and catﬁsh!

dothraki: Yazh adavranáz! Yazh rhaeshoón ésina! Yazh athjolinaraán! Yazh adavranáz! (77_6.mp3)
ipa: jaʒ a.da.vɾa.ˈnaz jaʒ ɾha.e.ʃo.ˈon ˈe.si.na jaʒ aθ.jo.li.na.ɾa.ˈan jaʒ a.da.vɾa.ˈnaz
english: The best spices! Spices from different lands! Spices for cooking! The best spices!

dothraki: Ma yer zígeree himoón gommasaán ayyéy! (pp610_8.mp3)
ipa: ma jer ˈzi.ge.ɾe.e hi.mo.ˈon gom.ma.sa.ˈan aj.ˈjej
english: And you always need a ﬁst to the mouth!

dothraki: Ma akát yéroa dógi gregoón. Vos ále jinoón! (pp610_9.mp3)
ipa: ma a.ˈkat ˈje.ɾo.a ˈdo.gi gɾe.go.ˈon vos ˈa.le dʒi.no.ˈon
english: And you both suffer from splinters. No more of this!
I will get a new vest.
Take this medallion belt with you.
The new wife of the khal is beautiful.
I'm a better rider than Jedo.
Everyone's a better rider than Jedo.
I will take his woman from him.
I will come for you soon.

dothraki: Ahéshke vo dávrao. Vorsáska állayafa ánna. (gow_12.mp3)
ipa: a.ˈheʃ.ke vo ˈda.vɾa.o voɾ.ˈsas.ka ˈal.la.ja.fa ˈan.na
english: Winter is no good. I like summer.
The sun's been obscured by clouds.
Pull the tongue from his head!

dothraki: Eqorasás máe! (827_6.mp3) (Note: The word for "it" is the same was the word for "s/he".)

english: I want to take a bite out of those pears!
My horse is riding for her!

dothraki: Hash yer ée hash ánha arissák hatíf! (pp610_51.mp3)
ipa: haʃ jer ˈe.e haʃ ˈan.ha a.ɾis.ˈsak ha.ˈtif
english: If you move I'll cut your face!

dothraki: Ánha qorasók jin groqekés! K'ási fíni hash yer nákhoe ánna?  (828_8.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha qo.ɾa.ˈsok dʒin gɾo.qe.ˈkes ˈka.si ˈﬁ.ni haʃ jer ˈna.xo.e ˈan.na
english: I claim this ugly wench! By whose authority do you stop me?
By the authority of the Khaleesi.

dothraki: Khal fíni laz vos dóthrae vos khal. (pp610_59.mp3)
ipa: xal ˈﬁ.ni laz vos ˈdo.θɾa.e vos xal
english: A khal who cannot ride is not a khal.
That is blood from the khal's horse.
A great man! A great man!

dothraki: Zhey Rákharo, zhey Ággo, zhey Kovárro. Fíchi hrazéf zínayi kíshi. (113_1.mp3)
ipa: ʒej ˈra.xa.ɾo ʒej ˈag.go ʒej ko.ˈva.ro ˈﬁ.tʃi hɾa.ˈzef ˈzi.na.ji ˈki.ʃi
english: Rakharo, Aggo, Kovvaro. Take our remaining horses.

dothraki: Ma yer ádothrae tith; ma yer heshtíth; ma yer valshtíth. (113_2.mp3)
ipa: ma jer ˈa.do.θɾa.e tiθ ma jer heʃ.ˈtiθ ma jer valʃ.ˈtiθ
english: You will ride east; you southeast; and you northeast.

dothraki: Vaés, che thíri che drívi. Ma verakasarís ma vóji. Che ashefaés che tozaraés che Hávazzhife Zhókwa. Ézo athchilár Athasaroón Vírzetha hatíf kíshi, ma réki vékha yómme moón. Hash ánha vek jinnoón, hash ánha anesák rekkaán ek ánha, ma kíﬁnosi ek ánha rekkaán. (113_4.mp3)
ipa: va.ˈes tʃe ˈθi.ɾi tʃe ˈdɾi.vi ma ve.ɾa.ka.sa.ˈɾis ma ˈvo.dʒi tʃe a.ʃe.fa.ˈes tʃe to.za.ɾa.ˈes tʃe ˈha.vaʒ.ʒi.fe ˈʒo.kwa ˈe.zo aθ.tʃi.ˈlar a.θa.sa.ɾo.ˈon ˈviɾ.ze.θa ha.ˈtif ˈki.ʃi ma ˈre.ki ˈve.xa ˈjom.me mo.ˈon haʃ ˈan.ha vek dʒin.no.ˈon haʃ ˈan.ha a.ne.ˈsak rek.ka.ˈan ek ˈan.ha ma ˈki.ﬁ.no.si ek ˈan.ha rek.ka.ˈan
english: Cities, living or dead. Caravans and people. Rivers, or lakes, or the Great Salt Sea. Find how far the Red Waste extends before us, and what lies on the other side. When I leave this place, I will know where I am going, and how to get there.

dothraki: vóji should be vojís Dany calls Rakharo by name and then says: Yer athzalár nákhoki ánni, zhey qoy qóyi. (113_5.mp3)
ipa: jer aθ.za.ˈlar ˈna.xo.ki ˈan.ni ʒej qoj ˈqo.ji
english: You are my last hope, blood of my blood.

dothraki: Ánha vos oziyenék sháfkea, zhey qoy qóyi. (113_6.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha vos o.zi.je.ˈnek ˈʃaf.ke.a ʒej qoj ˈqo.ji
english: I will not fail you, blood of my blood.

dothraki: Áffa, áffa. Móri laz vos átthi oakáh vosécchi. (3_2.mp3)
ipa: ˈaf.fa ˈaf.fa ˈmo.ɾi laz vos ˈaθ.θi o.a.ˈkah vo.ˈset.tʃi
english: Shh. They cannot kill his soul.

dothraki: Jin tish móri! Móri ogísh ven máe ven rho. Móri avvirsósh khadoés moón. Me laz ódothrae kími máe she Rháeshi Ájjalani avvós. (3_3.mp3)
ipa: dʒin tiʃ ˈmo.ɾi ˈmo.ɾi o.ˈgiʃ ven ˈma.e ven ɾho ˈmo.ɾi av.viɾ.ˈsoʃ xa.do.ˈes mo.ˈon me laz ˈo.do.θɾa.e ˈki.mi ˈma.e ʃe ˈɾha.e.ʃi ˈad.dʒa.la.ni av.ˈvos
english: They did! They butchered him like an animal. They did not burn his body. He can never join his ancestors in the Night Lands.

dothraki: Áffa. Kísha ámariki vorsqóy ha maán. Majín ánha asták yeraán asqóy, me-Rákharo ádothrae kími máe ajjalán. (3_4.mp3)
ipa: ˈaf.fa ˈki.ʃa ˈa.ma.ɾi.ki voɾs.ˈqoj ha ma.ˈan ma.ˈdʒin ˈan.ha as.ˈtak je.ɾa.ˈan as.ˈqoj me. ˈɾa.xa.ɾo ˈa.do.θɾa.e ˈki.mi ˈma.e ad.dʒa.ˈlan
english: Shh. We will build him a funeral pyre. And I promise you, Rakharo will ride with his ancestors tonight.

dothraki: Me nem azh anhaán ki Sénthisiri—jin Fózaki Qarthoón. (3_6.mp3)
ipa: me nem aʒ an.ha.ˈan ki ˈsen.θi.si.ɾi dʒin ˈfo.za.ki qaɾ.θo.ˈon
english: It was given to me by the Thirteen—the Elders of Qarth.
Three days to the east, on the sea.

dothraki: Móri astísh memóri nem áchomoe hash móri víddee Mayés Zhavvórsi. (3_10.mp3)
ipa: ˈmo.ɾi as.ˈtiʃ me.ˈmo.ɾi nem ˈa.tʃo.mo.e haʃ ˈmo.ɾi ˈvid.de.e ma.ˈjes ʒav.ˈvoɾ.si
english: They said they would be honored to receive the Mother of Dragons.

dothraki: Zhey Írri, zhey Dórea. Fíchi máe. (3_11.mp3)
ipa: ʒej ˈi.ri ʒej ˈdo.ɾe.a ˈﬁ.tʃi ˈma.e

dothraki: Ánha sóqe ákka jin sacchéy éssheyi. (415_1.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha ˈso.qɛ ˈak.ka dʒin sat.ˈtʃej ˈeʃ.ʃe.ji
english: I rewove this part of the top.

dothraki: Qísi tim, ánha arrísse vemishíkh jinoón ákka. (415_2.mp3)
ipa: ˈqe.si tim ˈan.ha a.ˈris.se ve.mi.ˈʃix dʒi.no.ˈon ˈak.ka
english: And I ﬁxed the heel on this one.

dothraki: "Thank you", followed by zhey ókeo ánni. The idea with the latter would be that since Dothraki has no word for "thank you", Dany borrowed the Common term into Dothraki to compensate. Doreah brings in Dany's new dress, Dany mentions Khal Drogo, and Irris says: Me dothralatés she Rháeshi Ájjalani ayyeyaán. (415_4.mp3)
ipa: me do.θɾa.la.ˈtes ʃe ˈɾha.e.ʃi ˈad.dʒa.la.ni aj.je.ja.ˈan
english: May he ride through the Night Lands forever.

dothraki: princess. She's a kháleesi", you might drop the second "a" (i.e. "She's kháleesi"), or the ﬁrst, or even both. Her next line doesn't seem to call for Dothraki, but just to give you the option, here it is in Dothraki: Yer jif óndee máe, zhey kháleesi. Yer nevák móri. Me fáti momás. (415_5.mp3)
ipa: jer dʒif ˈon.de.e ˈma.e ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si jer ne.ˈvak ˈmo.ɾi me ˈfa.ti mo.ˈmas
english: You should wear it, Khaleesi. You are their guest. It would be rude.

dothraki: Kísha névaki máe! Yer laz vos véfenari máe vos távi máe vos ívvisi máe. (416_2.mp3)
ipa: ˈki.ʃa ˈne.va.ki ˈma.e jer laz vos ˈve.fe.na.ɾi ˈma.e vos ˈta.vi ˈma.e vos ˈiv.vi.si ˈma.e
english: We are his guests! You can't pry it or chop it or melt it.

dothraki: Voséchhi, zhey kháleesi! Kísha váyoki athezaraán kíshi. (416_3.mp3)
ipa: vo.ˈset.tʃi ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si ˈki.ʃa ˈva.jo.ki a.θe.za.ɾa.ˈan ˈki.ʃi
english: Of course not, khaleesi! We will wait until we leave.

dothraki: Hash idrík kíshi víjazero kísha Athasaroón Vírzetha hash yer záli ziﬁchelát moón? Ánha acharák vos alíkh. (416_6.mp3)
ipa: haʃ i.ˈdɾik ˈki.ʃi ˈvi.ja.ze.ɾo ˈki.ʃa a.θa.sa.ɾo.ˈon ˈviɾ.ze.θa haʃ jer ˈza.li zi.ﬁ.tʃe.ˈlat mo.ˈon ˈan.ha a.tʃa.ˈɾak vos a.ˈlix
english: Our host saved us from the Red Waste and you want to steal from him? I will hear no more.

dothraki: Ánha aﬁchák sháfkea nhareés jin movekoón, zhey kháleesi. (8_1.mp3)
ipa: ˈan.ha a.ﬁ.ˈtʃak ˈʃaf.ke.a nha.ɾe.ˈes dʒin mo.ve.ko.ˈon ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si
english: I will bring you this sorcerer's head, khaleesi.

dothraki: Arákh yéri vos ódavrae yeraán ki móveki. (8_2.mp3)
ipa: a.ˈɾax ˈje.ɾi vos ˈo.da.vɾa.e je.ɾa.ˈan ki ˈmo.ve.ki
english: Your arakh won't help you against the warlock.

dothraki: Hash máe vívekhera ma qoyoón ma tolorroón? (8_3.mp3)
ipa: haʃ ˈma.e ˈvi.ve.xe.ɾa ma qo.jo.ˈon ma to.lo.ro.ˈon
english: Is he made of blood and bone?

dothraki: Ázhi anhaán vasterát Andahlaán, zhey qoy qóyi. (8_4.mp3)
ipa: ˈa.ʒi an.ha.ˈan vas.te.ˈɾat an.da.hla.ˈan ʒej qoj ˈqo.ji
english: Let me speak with the Andal, blood of my blood.

dothraki: Vaés léisi, zhey kháleesi. Me nem nésa. (10_1.mp3)
ipa: va.ˈes ˈle.i.si ʒej ˈxa.le.e.si me nem ˈne.sa
english: A house of ghosts, khaleesi. It is known.

dothraki: Vo lóshaki. Móveki addrivát k'áthmovezari, vo ki táwakoﬁ. (10_3.mp3)
ipa: vo ˈlo.ʃa.ki ˈmo.ve.ki ad.dɾi.ˈvat ˈkaθ.mo.ve.za.ɾi vo ki ˈta.wa.ko.ﬁ
english: No guards. The warlocks kill with sorcery, not steel.

dothraki: Yer vos jínne. Yer laz vos. (10_7.mp3)
ipa: jer vos ˈdʒin.ne jer laz vos
english: You're not here. You cannot be.

dothraki: Jíni athmovezár qóyi ven athmovezár fíni ﬁch yéra anhoón—fíni ﬁch yéra anhoón hatíf… (10_9.mp3)
ipa: ˈdʒi.ni aθ.mo.ve.ˈzar ˈqɔ.ji ven aθ.mo.ve.ˈzar ˈﬁ.ni ﬁtʃ ˈje.ɾa an.ho.ˈon ˈﬁ.ni ﬁtʃ ˈje.ɾa an.ho.ˈon ha.ˈtif
english: This is dark magic, like the magic that took you from me. Took you from before I could even…

dothraki: it should be good enough (the preposition hatíf would be a natural place to pause in the Dothraki sentence). Drogo (and all the rest is his): Ishísh ánha drivák vósma ánha ray nesók máe vos. Ishísh ánha ma yeroón she Rháeshi Ájjalani. (10_10.mp3)
ipa: i.ˈʃiʃ ˈan.ha dɾi.ˈvak ˈvos.ma ˈan.ha raj ne.ˈsok ˈma.e vos i.ˈʃiʃ ˈan.ha ma je.ɾo.ˈon ʃe ˈɾha.e.ʃi ˈad.dʒa.la.ni
english: Maybe I am dead and I just don't know it yet. Maybe I am with you in the Night Lands.

dothraki: Ma ishísh ánha zájje emralát Rhaeshís Ájjalani óma yeroón. Ishísh ánha ast Vezhofaán memé jífo hílee ma ánha jad jinnaán háji ayolát yéra. (10_11.mp3)
ipa: ma i.ˈʃiʃ ˈan.ha ˈzad.dʒe e.mɾa.ˈlat ɾha.e.ˈʃis ˈad.dʒa.la.ni ˈo.ma je.ɾo.ˈon i.ˈʃiʃ ˈan.ha ast ve.ʒo.fa.ˈan me.ˈme ˈdʒi.fo ˈhi.le.e ma ˈan.ha dʒad dʒin.na.ˈan ˈha.dʒi a.yo.ˈlat ˈje.ɾa
english: Or maybe I refused to enter the Night Lands without you. Maybe I told the Great Stallion to go fuck himself and came back here to wait for you.

dothraki: Jíni véna tikh meyér jif ti. (10_12.mp3)
ipa: ˈdʒi.ni ˈve.na. tix me.ˈjer dʒif ti
english: That sounds like something that you would do.

dothraki: Ma ishísh me átthirarido. Átthirarido che yéri che ánni… Ánha vo nesók. Jíni qáfe ha máhrazhea vílle ma qórasoa réddi. (10_13.mp3)
ipa: ma i.ˈʃiʃ me ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi.do ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾido tʃe ˈje.ɾi tʃe ˈan.ni ˈan.ha vo ne.ˈsok ˈdʒi.ni ˈqɑ.fe ha ˈma.hɾa.ʒe.a ˈvil.le ma ˈqɔ.ɾa.so.a ˈred.di
english: Or maybe it is a dream. Your dream, my dream… I do not know. These are questions for wise men with skinny arms.

dothraki: Yer jalán átthirari ánni. Haz nesák ánha dísse, ma ánha zigerók nesát vos alíkh. Ma hash jíni átthirarido, hash ánha vaddrivák mahrazhés ﬁn kis vállatha ánna. (10_14.mp3)
ipa: jer dʒa.ˈlan ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi ˈan.ni haz ne.ˈsak ˈan.ha ˈdis.se ma ˈan.ha zi.ge.ˈɾok ne.ˈsat vos a.ˈlix ma haʃ ˈdʒi.ni ˈaθ.θi.ɾa.ɾi.do haʃ ˈan.ha vad.dɾi.ˈvak ma.hɾa.ˈʒes ﬁn kis ˈval.la.θa ˈan.na
english: You are the Moon of my Life. That is all I know, and all I need to know. And if this is a dream, I will kill the man who tries to wake me.
